name: Transparent Vector Icons Pack 200+
description:
Transparent Vector Icons Pack is the largest Icon Pack for Figma in the world. Kickstart any project, save thousands of hours, and level up as a designer.


This is a very useful & essential icons pack designed in Figma, with 200+ high-quality Transparent clean icons.


The Transparent icons are beautifully crafted for any type of UI Design including website UI, mobile app UI, and web app UI design. It‚Äôs very minimalistic, aesthetic, and suitable across a variety of design projects.


Getting started

This user friendly transparent vector icons pack includes different sets of semi-transparent vector icons, each with its own set of instructions for using them on any light or dark theme. Meaning the icons can be used anywhere on any theme or background according to the branding colors.


Usability:

Because the icons are semi-transparent, you don't need to apply blending modes to them when putting them on backgrounds with a variety of colors and saturation levels. They're also simple to recolor, as both the light and dark versions of the icons just require one color from the palette. So it's very easy to use just pick the icon and paste , and boom you are doneüòÅ.

Package:


Package:


All forms and lines are filled with a single color gradient that ranges from opaque to entirely transparent, with line thickness equal to one pixel.
